title: Stuck on Authentication?
body:
When logging in I get stuck on "Login Status: Authenticating"

Anybody know if this is a know issue or is it something on my end?

replies.body: Typically this happens if your network is having a hard time maintaining a solid connection with our servers. Let's double check your [**network settings**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to make sure nothing has possibly been reset there.
Yea im having the same issue so is my roommate
